org.hypergraphdb.viewer.phoebe.util
Class PSmallBoundsHandle

java.lang.Object
  edu.umd.cs.piccolo.PNode
      org.hypergraphdb.viewer.phoebe.util.PSmallHandle
          org.hypergraphdb.viewer.phoebe.util.PSmallBoundsHandle
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.print.Printable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class PSmallBoundsHandle
extends PSmallHandle

PSmallBoundsHandle a handle for resizing the bounds of another node. If a bounds handle is dragged such that the other node's width or height becomes negative then the each drag handle's locator assciated with that other node is "flipped" so that they are attached to and dragging a different corner of the nodes bounds.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Jesse Grosjean
See Also:
Serialized Form
